mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE_POST (NOTICE_POST_NUMBER, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_NUMBER, NOTICE_POST_TITLE, NOTICE_POST_CONTENT, NOTICE_POST_DATE, NOTICE_POST_UPDATE) VALUES (seq_notice_POST.nextVal, 1, #{adminNumber}, #{noticePostTitle}, #{noticePostContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NP.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER, NP.NOTICE_POST_TITLE, NP.NOTICE_POST_CONTENT, NP.NOTICE_POST_DATE, NVL(NP.NOTICE_POST_UPDATE, NP.NOTICE_POST_DATE) AS NOTICE_POST_UPDATE, A.Admin_number FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST NP JOIN TBL_NOTICE_TYPE NT ON NP.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = NT.NOTICE_TYPE_ID JOIN TBL_ADMIN A ON NP.ADMIN_NUMBER = A.ADMIN_NUMBER WHERE NP.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER = #{noticePostNumber}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT P.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER, P.ADMIN_NUMBER, P.NOTICE_POST_TITLE, P.NOTICE_POST_CONTENT, P.NOTICE_POST_DATE, P.NOTICE_POST_UPDATE, P.NOTICE_TYPE_ID FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST P WHERE P.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 1 ORDER BY P.NOTICE_POST_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT P.NOTICE_POST_NUMBER, P.ADMIN_NUMBER, P.NOTICE_POST_TITLE, P.NOTICE_POST_CONTENT, P.NOTICE_POST_DATE, P.NOTICE_POST_UPDATE, P.NOTICE_TYPE_ID FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST P WHERE P.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 1 OR NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 2 ORDER BY P.NOTICE_POST_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NOTICE_POST SET NOTICE_POST_TITLE = #{noticePostTitle}, NOTICE_POST_CONTENT = '#{noticePostContent}, NOTICE_POST_UPDATE = SYSDATE, WHERE NOTICE_POST_NUMBER = #{noticePostNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST NP WHERE NOTICE_POST_NUMBER = #{noticePostNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_POST_TITLE) FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST WHERE NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 1
SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_POST_TITLE) FROM TBL_NOTICE_POST WHERE NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 1 OR NOTICE_TYPE_ID = 2
